description:
Provides a NS1 Team resource. This can be used to create, modify, and delete
teams. The credentials used must have the `manage_teams` permission set.

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

AccountManageAccountSettings.description: Whether the team can modify account settings.

AccountManageApikeys.description: Whether the team can modify account apikeys.

AccountManagePaymentMethods.description: Whether the team can modify account payment methods.

AccountManagePlan.description: Whether the team can modify the account plan.

AccountManageTeams.description: Whether the team can modify other teams in the account.

AccountManageUsers.description: Whether the team can modify account users.

AccountViewActivityLog.description: Whether the team can view activity logs.

AccountViewInvoices.description: Whether the team can view invoices.

DataManageDatafeeds.description: Whether the team can modify data feeds.

DataManageDatasources.description: Whether the team can modify data sources.

DataPushToDatafeeds.description: Whether the team can publish to data feeds.

DhcpManageDhcp.description:
Whether the team can manage DHCP.
Only relevant for the DDI product.

DhcpViewDhcp.description:
Whether the team can view DHCP.
Only relevant for the DDI product.

DnsManageZones.description: Whether the team can modify the accounts zones.

DnsViewZones.description: Whether the team can view the accounts zones.

DnsZonesAllow.description: List of zones that the team may access.

DnsZonesAllowByDefault.description: If true, enable the `dns_zones_allow` list, otherwise enable the `dns_zones_deny` list.

DnsZonesDeny.description: List of zones that the team may not access.

IpamManageIpam.description:
Whether the team can manage IPAM.
Only relevant for the DDI product.

IpamViewIpam.description:
Whether the team can view IPAM.
Only relevant for the DDI product.

MonitoringManageJobs.description: Whether the team can modify monitoring jobs.

MonitoringManageLists.description: Whether the team can modify notification lists.

MonitoringViewJobs.description: Whether the team can view monitoring jobs.

Name.description: The free form name of the team.

SecurityManageActiveDirectory.description:
Whether the team can manage global active directory.
Only relevant for the DDI product.

SecurityManageGlobal2fa.description: Whether the team can manage global two factor authentication.
